review_data.title: nice atmopshere, good ingredients
review_data.content: This place is so cosy, especially during cold winter days - but also in summer, when sitting outside on the grass and around is possible. Good tea selection and coffees, nice mezze-food all day long (during lunch they have some special menus). prices are moderate.

review_data.title: Amazing place
